Disposition
Judgment not entered on 1 & 5 as multipicitous, Dkt. No. 657.
IMPRISONMENT: The Defendant is sentenced to a term of 240 Months. Count 3 a sentence of 60 Months. Count 4 a sentence of 120 Months. Count 6 a sentence of 240 Months. All Counts to run concurrently.
